articles.title: MIT made sticky wearable sensor could check your organ health - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: The MIT-developed sensor could detect signs of disease such as liver and kidney failure, and the progression of solid tumors.

articles.title: Blood Immunity Altered in Alzheimer’s - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study reveals epigenetic alterations in the immune system of Alzheimer's patients' blood, suggesting environmental or behavioral factors could influence Alzheimer's risk.

articles.title: Quitting smoking at any age brings big health benefits, fast: study - Temerty Faculty of Medicine
articles.description: People who quit smoking see major gains in life expectancy after just a few years, according to a new study by University of Toronto researchers at Unity Health Toronto.
